purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: This experiment aims to get as many images of the solar photosphere as possible. The better the image, the more accurate the measurement of solar activity we get.

tel_desc.title: Telescope description
tel_desc.content: This experiment interacts with the TADs telescope installed at the Observatorio del Teide in Tenerife.

target.title: Target
target.point: Asking TADs to point to the Sun
target.request: Just click on the Sun to start pointing
target.pointed: The telescope is tracking, you can use the finder arrows to centre
